DOC.brief_summary: To determine level zidovudine triphosphate ( AZT-TP ) maternal fetal cord blood mononuclear cell . To determine ratio AZT-TP endogenous nucleoside triphosphate level maternal fetal cell . To determine extent drug transfer feto/placental unit .
